column2: but we were fortunate enough to walk up to 2 empty seats at the sushi bar! It was a Sunday evening
column3: early dinner - like 5:45pm. It was nice to order from the sushi chef and watch the kitchen roll out dish after beautiful dish. We ordered all 3 sushi rolls from the happy hour menu
column4: as well as my all-time favorite app
column5: the machi cure. Will be back soon!
